colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,CES GNOD SBYIN CHEN PO RDO RJE BDUD 'DUL GYI BSKANG GSO'I RIM PA BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG,, RIGS RUS MCHOG TU DGE ZHING, DAD PA DANG RNAM DPYOD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA, RIG GNAS MTHA' DAG LA MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN YANGS GA-YO BA'I SDE BA RNAM SRAS DZA MA LA ZHES BYA BAS BSKUL NGOR, MDO RGYUD DAM PA'I MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, 'DI'I SGRUB THABS SLOB DPON PADMAS MDZAD PAR GRAGS PA DANG, GRVA BA MNGON SHES KYIS MDZAD ZER BA'I YIG RNYING 'GA' ZHIG 'DUG KYANG, SNGA MO NAS BRGYUD PAS BRIS NOR MNGON CHE ZHING, PHAL TSIG RING THUNG YANG MI SNYOMS PA YID BRTAN DKA' BA DANG, GZHAN MA KHRUNGS BTZUN PA'I GTOR CHOG GTZAD MA ZHIG MA MTHONG YANG, 'DI'I RJES GNANG LAS TSOGS RAGS RIM DPAL LDAN DAM PA'I ZHABS DRUNG DU THOB PA'I GDAMS PA LA GZHI BYAS, SNGAR GYI YIG RNYING DE DAG GI LEGS CHA RNAMS KYIS KYANG KHA BSKANGS TE, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SUG BRIS SU BYAS PA LAS, SLAR YI GE PA NI RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA'I LOTZTSA BA DGE 'DUN DPAL 'BAR RO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG , ,,
